reviewText: The eigth episode of this third season, A FRIEND IN DEED, was broadcasted on May 5th, 1974. It's also possible to watch this episode in the DVD standard by purchasing Columbo - The Complete Third Season. This episode is directed by the well-known actor Ben Gazzara who, with Peter Falk, belongs to this batch of actors who used to work with director John Cassavetes. This is not the best episode of the season but the way Columbo manages to confound the murderer is brilliant.
